name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Online Text Editor Like Notepad & Wordpad

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Best and free online text editor like notepad, wordpad and word editor to write your text while browsing multiple tabs on web.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Welcome on the Best and free online text editor like notepad by using this extension you can write texts, copy and paste texts.  By using this simple tool you can type important notes, texts while browsing on any tab on the browser. You don't need to keep any offline text editor open.

Simply open this extension on the tabs you are working and type your notes it will automatically save it. So, you don't need to worry about the deletion of the notes that you have created. After completion you can click on download and save that text file to your local storage. This tool is very good and it will increase you productivity while working online or gathering any information from the web.

Features:
- Easy to use
- Option to download text files locally
- Auto save notes
- Same data will be appear on all the tabs active on browser
